last_episode_to_air.name: A Guide to Guilt
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ashley tells Elizabeth and John about the guilt tied to her involvement in Colton Ashford’s death. Elizabeth celebrates the completion of the church nursery. Meanwhile, Dirk holds Kari and a guest hostage in her home.

name: The Baxters
overview: A riveting family drama that follows Elizabeth and John Baxter and their five adult children.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Season One centers on Elizabeth and John's daughter, Kari, who learns the shocking truth that her husband, Tim, has been secretly having an affair. As her relationship is tested, Kari must seek comfort in her faith and family.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season Two will test the family's faith in new and profound ways. Ashley begins to take control of her life. Kari struggles with the death of her husband. Then, when an unthinkable tragedy strikes the community, each Baxter family member is affected and must cope. Luke, the once confident believer in God, spirals into anger and doubt after his relationship with Reagan is tested.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season three, Luke is still reeling from the horrific tragedy at his family's church. Angry at himself and everyone around him, Luke becomes hardened as he moves further away from his faith and family. The other Baxter siblings must navigate their own unique collective hardships. Kari has doubts about marrying Ryan, and Ashley's past life in Paris returns to haunt her.

tagline: The love they share. The secrets they keep.

episodes.name: Under the Surface
episodes.overview: A celebratory Mother's Day for the Baxter family's matriarch, Elizabeth, is disrupted when one of her daughters, Kari, discovers a shocking revelation about her husband, Tim.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: Looking for comfort from family and friends, Kari moves back home with her parents. Tim looks to deepen his relationship with Angela. While at home, Kari learns that her first love, Ryan, has moved back to town.

episodes.name: Irreconcilable Differences
episodes.overview: Dirk confronts Angela about her affair. Tim attempts to give Kari divorce paperwork, but Elizabeth intercepts it. Determined to save her marriage, Kari reveals an unexpected truth to Tim that could change their lives forever.

episodes.name: In Hindsight
episodes.overview: After Kari reveals her pregnancy to Tim, Angela shows her frustration at the lack of progress in his divorce. Dirk continues to obsess over Angela. Kari spends the day with Ryan. John shares a profound message of hope for Elizabeth and his family.

episodes.name: In the Heat Of
episodes.overview: Tim's drinking spirals out of control. Luke invites Reagan to the Baxter family home for a pool date. Ashley has an unexpected run-in with an old crush from high school and Kari looks to her mom for advice on her marriage.

episodes.name: For Better or Worse
episodes.overview: Kari and Tim decide to work on fixing their marriage. Luke and Reagan continue their courtship. Ryan gets an unexpected coaching opportunity that would take him away from Kari. Elizabeth sees an old friend with ties to Ashley's traumatic past.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.overview: Five months have passed. Kari and Tim are in marriage counseling. Luke plans a fundraiser at church, but when Ashley unexpectedly arrives, old family wounds are reopened. Dirk's obsession with Angela and Tim takes a dangerous turn.

episodes.name: Food for Thought
episodes.overview: The Baxter family Thanksgiving is full of food and football with a side of drama. After showing up late to dinner, Ashley is confronted by her family. Luke tells Reagan about his best friend's tragic death while Kari and Tim share good news.

episodes.name: Justin D. James & Jessie Rosen
episodes.overview: As Christmas approaches, Luke seeks reconciliation with his sister, but Ashley's past haunts her. Kari and Tim's marital bond grows stronger as Tim celebrates six months of sobriety, but an unforeseen event could shatter everything.

episodes.name: A Guide to Guilt
episodes.overview: Ashley tells Elizabeth and John about the guilt tied to her involvement in Colton Ashford’s death. Elizabeth celebrates the completion of the church nursery. Meanwhile, Dirk holds Kari and a guest hostage in her home.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Season One centers on Elizabeth and John's daughter, Kari, who learns the shocking truth that her husband, Tim, has been secretly having an affair. As her relationship is tested, Kari must seek comfort in her faith and family.

episodes.name: Blank Canvas
episodes.overview: Kari visits Tim's grave with their three-month-old daughter, Jessie. Ashley takes advice from Elizabeth and Erica regarding a job interview. John and Brooke fight to save the life of a close family friend.

episodes.name: The Easy Part
episodes.overview: Elizabeth and Erin finish the new nursery. Ashley starts her new job, but a troublesome manager makes her first day difficult. Luke and Reagan discuss meeting Reagan’s family. Back at the hospital, Landon continues to fight for his life.

episodes.name: Erin's Birthday
episodes.overview: The Baxters prepare for Erin's birthday party. Now that Landon has miraculously recovered, he and Ashley have a difficult conversation. Kari and Ryan are in regular contact, while Erin and her husband Sam share unexpected news at the birthday party.

episodes.name: One Step Forward
episodes.overview: Elizabeth's nursery project at the church pays off, with new families touring the space. At Tim's grave, Kari makes a monumental decision. Ashley speaks up at work and reaches out to Landon for one last chat before he moves to California.

episodes.name: Memory Box
episodes.overview: Ashley attempts a kind gesture for one of her patients, but her manager, Belinda, rebukes her efforts. Luke and Reagan go bowling with her dad, and an unexpected visitor interrupts their cheerful outing. Kari makes a bold move to reconnect with Ryan.

episodes.name: Allure
episodes.overview: As Luke and Reagan's relationship grows deeper, Luke has a crisis of faith. Ashley and Landon work on their friendship but discover that keeping things platonic isn't easy. On a seemingly normal Sunday at church, something unimaginable happens.

episodes.name: When the Smoke Clears
episodes.overview: The Baxter family is in turmoil as they try to understand the tragedy at their church. John helps the paramedics and victims while Reagan begins to pull away from Luke. Ashley finds comfort with one of her patients at the care facility.

episodes.name: Paris
episodes.overview: The Baxters are recovering from the tragic tragedy at church. John considers building a monument to honor the dead. Luke tries to restore his relationship with Reagan, and Ryan considers staying in town to help John and Kari at the church.

episodes.name: Broken Pieces
episodes.overview: John works on the church's memorial garden. Ashley discovers a shocking truth about her manager, Belinda. Landon is frustrated with Ashley for not opening up about her past. Ryan shares a secret he’s been keeping from Kari.

episodes.name: Say a Little Prayer
episodes.overview: Kari confronts Ashley about kissing Ryan. Luke and Lori's relationship takes an unexpected turn. Ashley speaks with her former boss about Belinda’s deception. Kari's marriage counseling service at church gets its first participant.

episodes.name: Waiting for Wings
episodes.overview: Erin takes Kari's advice as she works on her marriage with Sam. Luke considers leaving home after he's confronted by Elizabeth and John. Kari and Ryan look to mend their relationship, and Ashley has a surprise for the patients and their families.

episodes.name: It's Not Perfect
episodes.overview: Ashley helps Landon prep for his big move and shares a traumatic event from her past. Elizabeth asks Luke to attend the memorial garden's dedication ceremony at church. Reagan has been keeping a life-changing secret.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season Two will test the family's faith in new and profound ways. Ashley begins to take control of her life. Kari struggles with the death of her husband. Then, when an unthinkable tragedy strikes the community, each Baxter family member is affected and must cope. Luke, the once confident believer in God, spirals into anger and doubt after his relationship with Reagan is tested.

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: John and Elizabeth sell their house. Kari prepares for Jessie's first birthday. Ashley misses Landon, who is battling fires in California. Luke is living with Lori, but it's trouble in paradise for the young couple.

episodes.name: Cautionary Tale
episodes.overview: Landon spends time with Reagan in the hospital. Kari goes wedding dress shopping. Ashley moves forward with painting and looks for opportunities out West. Luke's life unravels, and John meets a Vietnam veteran who shares a valuable lesson.

episodes.name: A Sisters Trip
episodes.overview: With the pressures of planning a wedding mounting, Kari joins Ashley on her trip to California. Landon spends time with Reagan as she struggles to cope with being a single mom. Pregnant and scared to tell Luke the truth, Lori reaches out for help.

episodes.name: The Moment of Truth
episodes.overview: Ashley confronts Landon about what she saw in the park. Kari makes a shocking discovery. Luke approaches Lori about the lies she's been telling him. Later, Lori falls ill and is taken to the hospital under John’s care.

episodes.name: A Step Forward
episodes.overview: Struggling with the responsibilities of being a single mom, Reagan confides in Kari. Ashley and Landon attend a trendy art gallery event in Los Angeles. Elizabeth and John's efforts to reconnect with Luke have failed, so Ryan makes one last attempt.

episodes.name: Unexpected Guest
episodes.overview: After recovering from her infection, Lori visits Elizabeth to confess a secret. Kari and Tim look at wedding venues. Ashley gives something to Luke that might help him find his way back to God. In California, Landon makes a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: Grief and Joy
episodes.overview: On the anniversary of Tim's passing and Jessie's first birthday, Kari debates whether to tell Tim's mom about her engagement. Elizabeth and Lori continue to bond. Erin seeks guidance about starting a family. Ashley gets a disturbing call from Paris.

episodes.name: A Protest
episodes.overview: Lori returns home to work things out with Luke. The Baxters attend a community service project after church. Ashley receives more mysterious calls from Paris. When Luke and Lori attend a protest rally, everything spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Ashley and Luke's new roommate arrangement isn't going well. Kari and Diane spend the day with baby Jessie. Brooke and her husband Peter take their daughter Maddie to the hospital after she falls ill. Ashley receives profound advice from Irvel.

episodes.name: An Urgent Message
episodes.overview: Brooke and Peter get good news about Maddie's health scare. Ashley gets more calls from Paris and does her best to keep Luke's whereabouts a secret. Reagan considers reaching out to Luke. Erin opens up with Sam about her desire for a family.

episodes.name: God Made Us Three
episodes.overview: It's Ashley's big opening night at the art gallery, but the troubling news she received from Paris continues to haunt her. Kari looks for the perfect wedding dress, while Luke gets a visit from an old friend. Diane opens up to Kari and Ryan.

episodes.name: Return Together
episodes.overview: It's wedding bells for Kari and Ryan. Luke and Reagan introduce baby Thomas to the family. Ashley, Landon, and Brooke anxiously await test results. Erin and Sam finally have a conversation about starting a family.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season three, Luke is still reeling from the horrific tragedy at his family's church. Angry at himself and everyone around him, Luke becomes hardened as he moves further away from his faith and family. The other Baxter siblings must navigate their own unique collective hardships. Kari has doubts about marrying Ryan, and Ashley's past life in Paris returns to haunt her.
